product_name: Outdoor Research Helium II Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Outdoor Research Helium II jacket offers complete storm protection for fast-moving outdoor athletes. It's so light you'll forget it's clipped to your harness until that sudden downpour. Pertex(R) Shield+ 2.5-layer ripstop nylon is incredibly lightweight and supple and offers waterproof, windproof and highly breathable protection. All seams are sealed for complete protection. Adjustable hood shields head from the elements. Interior storm flap sits behind water-resistant front zipper; chin guard protects sensitive skin. Drawcord hem and elastic cuffs help seal out the elements. Zip chest pocket doubles as a stuff sack and has a webbing loop for clip-on convenience. Reflective hood trim improves nighttime profile. Outdoor Research Hleium II jacket has a standard fit that eases layering.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Helium II jacket offers complete storm protection for fast-moving outdoor athletes. It's so light you'll forget it's clipped to your harness until that sudden downpour.
